tweets.text: Absolute joke. The guy has made ¬£Ms. I am tired of hearing about what @EnvAgency / JUWC are going to do and how POCA will move the needle and yet nothing changes. Absolute joke. Who will remediate the crap dumped in this site? https://t.co/wPD2dLlsgM

'..illegally disposing of 100,000 tonnes of waste within the 1st 9 months of 2016'. How does this happen and how can he just be fined ¬£72K with no POCA? Vast amounts of l/fill tax avoided let alone how much he made.  https://t.co/JcbdvTcbM6
@SYFR @MyDoncaster @EnvAgencyYNE @YorkshireWater Thank you to all involved in dealing with this major fire! Local Heroes! #OneDoncasterOneFamily #doncasterisgreat

Disgraceful & no comments from @PHE_EoEngland to say this is unacceptable. Feel like I‚Äôm living in the twilight zone because I never thought this would happen in Britain @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @BorisJohnson WE CANT BREATHE! https://t.co/2oVvnT7hSF

@hackneycouncil @EnvAgency Many years ago I worked in a pollution monitoring station next to the Lee.
Rats (Weil's disease source) ran through the nearby undergrowth.
As an employee I had to handwash, wear a medicated barrier cream and rubber gloves.
Twenty feet away local kids were learning to canoe

@hackneycouncil @TheBrokedownPal @EnvAgency @LDNWaterkeeper has been promoting for greater transparency about pollution in London's rivers for years now. It's disgusting how often sewerage overflow goes into the Lea üò™

What are you doing about this @PHE_EoEngland @MattHancock ? If you are silent you are complicit in our babies and children inhaling the ‚Äòabnorma noxious fumes-600 complaints last weekend,when will this end? @BorisJohnson @MPGeorgeEustice @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA https://t.co/iC5W99jhVX
